commit.message:
Rollup merge of #55894 - RalfJung:validation-enums, r=oli-obk

miri enum discriminant handling: Fix treatment of pointers, better error when it is undef

r? @oli-obk

Rollup merge of #55894 - RalfJung:validation-enums, r=oli-obk

miri enum discriminant handling: Fix treatment of pointers, better error when it is undef

r? @oli-obk
